title: # 544 - Fortune Feimster & ME
itunes:title: # 544 - Fortune Feimster & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian, Fortune Feimster. We talk about Fortune doing a show with Arnold Schwarzenegger, happiness, wearing dresses, her time on The Chelsea Handler Show, shooting her special, and much more! 

 

Check out Fortunes new special “Good Fortune” streaming right now on Netflix!

 

Follow Fortune

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fortunefeimster 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/FortuneFeimster 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Rex MD. Go to http://www.rexmd.com/bert to get started with a starter pack prescription of generic Viagra or Cialis.

 

This episode is brought to you by Whoop Go to http://www.whoop.com and enter code BERT to save 10% off. To join the 2 Bears, 0 Drinks Team: https://app.whoop.com/mobile-redir?code=COMM-2BEARS (Mobile only)

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Berty Boy Productions: https://bertyboyproductions.com  

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
